title: New client and Runes Tier 2
body:
Sometimes when I don't have enough IP I'm buying Runes Tier 2. And successively change Runes T2 with Runes T3. 

In the new client the filtering doesn't work too good. (Even I set filter, and expand/close runes category I see all or none) Is there way to delete Runes T2 which I don't want anymore?

I don't see purpose of deleting Runes T3. But delete Runes T2 it would be great for me.

replies.body: The updated client is still in testing, so be sure to report any feedback you have through the bug icon on the client or the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  It's not possible to manually remove runes manually, but we can help!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll look at your specific request individually.  We'll get back to you!
